title: NFL Draft Day 1 Reaction
description:
Laura, Marcus, RC, Dan, Mina, Miller, and Keyshawn discuss all top 5 picks being defensive players, record breaking 6 wide receivers in the first round, trades galore, Travon Walker going 1st overall, Kenny Pickett to the Steelers, and best players left on the board. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: NFL Draft Day 1 Reaction and Day 2 Preview
